Reviews.Title: I love this phone!
Reviews.Author: Apple0531
Reviews.Content: I love this Blackberry phone more than any phone I have ever used. I owned one once before, and was addicted to it. It gets great apps, good customizing abilities, not to mention it is a cute color. The only issue I ever had with it was it takes forever to turn back on if it dies or if you turn it off for a long time. But as long as you take good care of it, and keep it charged regularly, it should work fine. The only other issue I have is when the battery power gets too low, the service cuts off and you can't make calls or send texts. So you have to keep it charged nightly! The sound is good, it has Facebook, Youtube, Twitter, a very good camera, great app store, and a very cute look. It doesn't have all of the same apps as you can get for a Droid or iPhone, but I always loved this more than any Droid I've ever owned. I've had more trouble and problems out of Droid than any other phone. I always end up coming back to my Blackberry. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Really Functional
Reviews.Author: Lobejean56
Reviews.Content: This is a cute and girly phone. I liked it the screen is too small for my weakening eye sight. Would have kept this phone if there had been a flash with the camera. Still it is a BlackBerry and a very useful phone.

Reviews.Title: best phone
Reviews.Author: Tessa
Reviews.Content: If you do not like a touch phone this is the phone for you! I am not a touch phone person and this phone does everything. I have a card for it that sore my photos and videos and the apps are great.  I can hear the phone with clearety with is importy, I am a blackberry person!!

Reviews.Title: It is a Sprint Phone
Reviews.Author: Malky Storch
Reviews.Content: I searched for Verizon Blackberry and this came up. The picture does not say Sprint on it, however when I received it I opened it and it is a Sprint phone. If it's Sprint write Sprint! If Verizon write Verizon if unlocked write unlocked. Not okay. tsk tsk. phone itself looked pretty decent though

Reviews.Title: Very Bad
Reviews.Author: Carlos C.
Reviews.Content: Buy this product long descriptions and said it was not before cdma'm from Venezuela and any telephone company accept myself even that I have the phone since neither serves to replace here but hey .. I feel I wasted my money

Reviews.Title: Not quite so smart
Reviews.Author: Chantel N. Nelson
Reviews.Content: My former Blackberry died in September of 2011 and when I went into Verizon for a replacement the salesperson assured me that this phone was just as good as the last Blackberry phone I had.  He was wrong....WAY WRONG. I explained that the nature of my work requires that I take photos and I needed a phone that would do that. This phone does not have a flash and the photo quality is HORRID.  If you take photos with this phone just know that you will only be able to enjoy them on the small screen on the phone. The screen on this phone is also smaller than my former phone. I am up for a phone renewal in February and can't wait to get something different!On the plus side, the speaker phone does work really well and the reception remains clear. I am able to receive calls when others around me have difficulty getting a signal.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: annonomys
Reviews.Content: If you have verizon wireless this is the phone to get! It is super easy to use and is great if you have job. I not only got the phone but it sent me a memory card and a case for it. This was such a great deal. The only problem is that the color is not fusia like it says, it is more of a bergundy red.

Reviews.Content: This phone is bad, it's being advertised as a GSM phone when it's not. It's just a piece of plastic. I do not recommend it to any one.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Denise Morales
Reviews.Content: This was my first smartphone, or how my friends like to call it, my first Big Girl Phone. It even got super wet and it continued to work!! It finally broke and I purchased the S3.

Reviews.Title: Beware, cannot use this with a SIM card!
Reviews.Author: Raquel
Reviews.Content: Not being familiar with the different cell phone technologies(CDMA vs GSM), I bought this phone thinking I can simply install my SIM card. WRONG! CDMA phones do not use SIM cards. Now I am stuck with a phone that does not work.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This Blackberry appeared to be what I wanted but I was disappointed when I recieved it.  First off, it was not all fuchsia pink, just the front edge as you see on the pic with a black back.  So no big colour sale there.  There was also a Verizon logo imprinted on the bottom, which you dont see on the pic.  Then when I tried to put my SIM card into the phone I realised that it does not take SIM cards, only chips.  So again, the phone was totally useless to me.  We dont use chips for any cellphone service in my country.  I had to return the item to Amazon.
